JAMES scrunches up the pieces of paper, throws it away. T budgerigars, sensing his distress, flutter and peep..
NIKI's P.O.V: feels someone touching his forehead and his hands with oil...and the sound of a WOMAN weeping... PRIEST

...durch diese heilige Salbung helfe dir der Herr in seinem reichen Erbarmen, er stehe dir bei mit der Kraft des Heiligen Geistes... NIKI's eyes barely crack open, barely manage to focus to an ELDERLY PRIEST is giving him the last rites in German. The sound of MARLENE crying somewhere in the room. PRIEST

Der Herr der dich von Sunden befreit, rette dich in seiner Gnade richte er dich auf... NIKI strains to move. A sense of excruciating pain. He fights to open his eyes, give an indication...ANY indication of the fact that he is hearing this, and is al and able to fight for life... But to no avail. The PRIEST continues giving last rites. MARLENE continues to cry. The PRIEST touches NIKI's shoulder... NIKI (V/O)
I'm here! Can't you tell? I'm here!
NIKI screams inside. Wanting to be heard. Wanting to give a sign. He's OK. He's still there. But it's no use. NIKI blacks out again. The pain is too great.

Sunrise: MARLENE has been sitting in the hospital all nig supported by members of FAMILY and several FRIENDS. Niki's MOTHER and FATHER. CLAY REGAZZONI. Presently: the door to the intensive care unit opens and DOCTOR comes out, beckoning her...
Frau Lauda? Bitte kommen Sie! He's awake! And just spoke! MARLENE scrambles to her feet...
What did he say?
"Tell the Priest to fuck off! I'm still alive!!" MARLENE covers her mouth, laughs nervously, already in te She and the DOCTOR rush into the intensive care unit.

Shooting through the window we see MARLENE approach NIKI' bed. She sees NIKI.. And gasps. Trying to control her expression. Not give awa him how horrified she is. NIKI's face: is grotesque. His head has swollen to double size. The skin has burned off on his head, his eyes. MARLENE bravely composes herself. Then, without displayin shock she feels - she goes over and kisses him.

location: NIKI'S HOSPITAL ROOM/TELEVISION COVERAGE FULL FR

text: The starter's flag drops. On television we see the Austri Grand Prix start. NIKI watches the race on television, while beginning his in bed, in pain as bandages are changed.. ON TV: JAMES narrowly misses out on a podium, but still g on NIKI in his points total... CAPTION: "RACE 11. HUNT FINISHES 4th"

NIKI continues his rehab in the hospital, now out of bed. ON TV: the starter's flag drops. Another Grand Prix start This time at Zandvoort, in the Netherlands.. NIKI watches the race on television as DOCTORS put a vacu pump into his lungs. It's AGONY. JAMES leads, driving the perfect race... YOUNG GERMAN DOCTOR

We need to vacuum the lungs. Without this, they can't heal. But it will hurt. An unimaginably painful pump is forced down his burned lu to try to hoover out the impurities.. COMMENTATORS ON TV: talk about how HUNT is catching up wi LAUDA on points. It spurs NIKI on, through gritted teeth. NIKI
Aaarrrggghhhh... The chequered flag. JAMES crosses the line in first posit
The DOCTORS tell NIKI he's had enough vacuum treatment. H had more than enough pain. But NIKI waves them aside...
Again!! The DOCTOR nods. The vacuum is turned on again. NIKI screams in agony. Eyes bulging. MARLENE and NIKI's f cannot bear to watch...
He watches as ON TV: JAMES is on the victory podium spray champagne.
NIKI continues screaming in pain, watching the Canadian G TV as..
For the first time, JAMES has taken the lead in points. N stares at the TV: his expression changes.
NIKI screams again. MARLENE, NIKI's family and the DOCTOR deeply distressed, cannot bring themselves to watch, as..
Aaaaarrrrggghghhhhhh!! We WIDEN to reveal what NIKI is doing. What has caused th unbearable, bloodcurdling screams of agony..
I know what you're all thinking... Now we see. With great difficulty NIKI has put his racing helmet on for the first time. Pressing into his open burn wounds...
But if you love me - all of you - you won't say a word. He is almost unconscious with pain. His legs are weak. Bu has done it...
The Italian Grand Prix. TELEVISION COMMENTARY sets the sc JAMES and the MCLAREN TEAM arrive in the pits to see a va commotion going on elsewhere...
What's going on?
Jesus. It's Niki.
What about him?
He's here! He's racing!
What?? They said he was half-dead. JAMES stares. Shaken.
JAMES pushes through the pitlanes, until he reaches the crowded FERRARI pits. He sees a racer in the background. name LAUDA on his overalls...

Niki? NIKI turns round. JAMES sets eyes on him for the first ti JAMES reels, visibly horrified by his appearance. His ban are blood stained. He has no hair. Looks grotesque.. NIKI sees the horror in JAMES's face. Sees the shock. The horror. And recognizes in that moment, this is how it's g to be - this is how people will respond to him - forever.
Wow. It's that bad, huh? JAMES opens his mouth. Tries to say something.

In the hospital I told them to tell me straight, no bullshit - how bad it would be. My appearance. They said with time it'd be fine. But it won't. I can tell, seeing your reaction. I am going to spend the rest of my life with a face that frightens people. NIKI stares at JAMES, at his rival's beauty, his blonde, tanned perfection. His matinee idol, movie star looks...
That's a tough one to get used to.
I wrote you a letter at the time. To apologize. (a beat)
JAMES (contid)
The driver's meeting in Germany? Before the race? I swayed the room.
Yes. You did.
That race should never have gone ahead.
No.
So in some ways...I feel responsible for what happened. I'm sorry.

Trust me, watching you win those points and all those races while I was in hospital fighting for my life...you were equally responsible for getting me better. Ouch. That could have been meant generously. But in this it wasn't. It was a cold slap in the face. NIKI turns and goes.

A packed press conference. The world's media. NIKI's acci and recovery (as a story) has reached way beyond F1 race This is front page news around the globe.. NIKI walks out onto the podium - all eyes staring at him sense of a ghoulish, voyeuristic freak show.... NIKI sits on the podium, in front of microphones, flanked both sides by FERRARI drivers and top brass. But no one w to talk to them. Everyone's here to talk to NIKI..
How are you feeling, Niki?
Fine.
Can you confirm for us exactly which procedures you have had? And the expectations for your recovery?

Sure. I had a skin graft operation where they put half my right thigh in my face. It doesn't look too good but one unexpected advantage is it's impossible to perspire through a skin graft, so sweat will never run in my eyes again - which is good for a driver. Laughter. At the back of the hall, JAMES HUNT creeps in, (unseen by anyone, disguised in a hat), to listen.
When they heard about your condition, Ferrari immediately hired another driver, Carlos Reutemann.
Ja. Before even my first operation.
Is he your replacement now?
No. Just another team-mate. Keen to make an impression. So let's see where Mr. Reutemann finishes today. Laughter.
James Hunt and McLaren have caught up a lot while you were away.
Yes. (a beat)
Is there a question now? Or are you just trying to piss me off? Laughter.
You think you can still win?
Of course. I have the better car. I'm the better driver. But he's a clever guy and has used the time well while I was lying half-dead in hospital to win some points.. Laughter.
What did your wife say when she saw your face? NIKI
She said, "Sweetie, you don't need a face to drive. Only a right foot." Laughter. BRITISH JOURNALIST
I'm being serious. Do you really think your marriage can survive? With the way you look now? Silence. NIKI squints into the lights.. NIKI
And I'm being serious, too. Which asshole said this? Jesus.. No one moves. NIKI, disgusted, rips off his microphone.. NIKI
Fuck you. Press conference over. NIKI walks out. The Press Conference breaks up... JAMES sees the REPORTER who asked the question, laughing his friends. JAMES watches as the REPORTER leaves...
JAMES goes after the REPORTER, and calls him.. JAMES
Hey..! The REPORTER turns, recognizes JAMES.. JAMES

I've got something for you on that last question... The BRITISH JOURNALIST smiles, "Great, thanks James!" Pul out a tape recorder. JAMES takes him to one side, then... "WHACK, WHACK, WHACK" - JAMES punches his lights out, the takes the tape recorder, stuffs it into the JOURNALISTS m JAMES
Now go home to your wife and ask her how YOU look!!
"CRASH" a final, sickening blow splits the REPORTER's nos
Prick!

JAMES walks out to his car. TV CREWS. Banks of PHOTOGRAPH Commentators talk in different languages. Everyone talking about NIKI's comeback. NIKI is in his car. The MECHANICS are talking to him in Italian... But NIKI hears nothing. He looks at the steering wheel, t shell of the car, the gear stick. And then we see.. His hands are shaking violently. He's utterly terrified. The light turns green. They're off! Other cars (including JAMES's), roar forward. But NIKI is frozen.

NIKI's mind is a mess - terrified - he starts slowly...fi his courage.. COMMENTATORS point out it's madness. It was clearly too s Ferrari were right to hire a replacement. NIKI is a wreck NIKI suffers terrible flashbacks from his accident... NIKI shakes himself out...gradually building up speed - ignoring the cars overtaking him all around him... NIKI begins to accelerate. Gently at first. Then a bit mo Trusting himself. Gaining confidence.. Blocking out further flashbacks...
Watching NIKI from the hospital where he had his treatmen the DOCTOR who treated him...
COMMENTATORS look up. Notice NIKI's slow increase in spee What's this? Maybe there's life in him yet... NIKI changes gears smoothly. He begins to overtake. The o feelings come back..
MARLENE watches from the pits. Can hardly bring herself t look...

COMMENTATORS begin to get excited. LAUDA has started to overtake the back-markers... An incredible sequence. As NIKI gains more confidence, mo speed, and begins to work his way through the field.. COMMENTATORS now buzzing with excitement. This is incredi as NIKI overtakes first CARLOS REUTEMANN, the driver hire replace him, then others, working his way through the fie

JAMES sees NIKI coming up behind him. Cannot believe his JAMES move to block NIKI's path... NIKI attacks fearlessly. Despite terrible pain. NIKI move overtake JAMES. Utterly intimidated by NIKI's bravery, JAMES panics, and control of the car. He spins out.. COMMENTATORS cannot believe their eyes. HUNT's blown it! LAUDA's overtaken him! It's a miracle. It defies belief. As NIKI crosses the lin CAPTION: "RACE 15. NIKI 4th. JAMES RETIRED."
The Italian crowds are ecstatic. Delirious. NIKI is a nat hero. Lazarus back from the dead. Superhuman.
TV commentary in different languages elaborates on what a extraordinary, superhuman achievement they have just seen
What a race! What a man! What a season! Now it all boils down to the final race in Japan! Hunt walks past, staring at a triumphant Niki.
The DOCTOR in the hospital shakes his head, cannot believ what he has just witnessed...
The Ferrari Mechanics that had initially so disliked NIKI overwhelmed by what he has achieved...
A reluctant, modest NIKI carried on shoulders, surrounded LUCA DI MONTEZEMOLO, MARLENE and the PRESS...

Mount Fuji towers imperiously, dramatically above the Jap race track, dominating the skyline on a clear day.. Television cameras and press photographers assemble at th race track for the biggest sporting event of the year...
JAMES sits alone in his hotel suite. Speaking to an old, trusted friend at the other end...
The man was in a coma. His doctors pronounced him dead!! Then he comes back and does THAT???
BUBBLES HORSLEY back at home in England. At a breakfast table.. BUBBLES (ON PHONE)

What did you expect? That Niki would give you the championship lying down? Of course not. He's a fighter. He's going to come at you with everything he's got. But you can do this. As a driver, you're his equal - better, maybe. And God knows you're quick and brave enough. You just.. JAMES (ON PHONE)
What? BUBBLES (ON PHONE)
Need to find the respect for yourself to close out when it really matters. You don't much like yourself, James - that's the problem, therefore don't believe you deserve it.
A knock at JAMES's hotel room door.. JAMES

I've got to go. JAMES hangs up, and goes to the door. He snaps it open to reveal.. Two gorgeous-looking BOAC Stewardesses standing outside. blue blazers, short skirts, white gloves, blue caps.. STEWARDESS
Hi. We've come for the party? JAMES
What party?
The party we were told was going on in room 2109. Sure enough: on JAMES's door, the number 2109. JAMES
Who sent you here?
A man. On the phone. He didn't give his name.
This man. Did he speak with an accent?
Yes. German accent. JAMES can't believe it. NIKI.
I'm afraid it was a joke..
(liking the look of JAMES)
Awwww. Pity.

Sorry, ladies. Any other time. Not tonight. JAMES closes the door. Goes back into his hotel room. The after a moment... He snaps open the door. The STEWARDESSES are about to disappear into the elevator...
Wait..!
The following morning, day barely breaks. The skies are ominously dark over Tokyo. Thick, black clouds. It's raining heavily...
NIKI wakes up and looks out of the window. Sees the heavy which is falling outside... His expression changes.
JAMES wakes up. Flinches. JAMES looks around, bleary-eyed Hungover. He's in a room that looks like a bomb has hit it.
The two STEWARDESSES are still asleep in the bed beside h Uniforms discarded on the floor. Memories are now flooding back. Jesus, what was he THINKI JAMES leaps out of bed.
NIKI is being massaged by WILLI DUNGL in his hotel room i preparation for the race. NIKI continues to stare out of the window. They speak in German. We see sub-titles..
Can't see the mountain.
So?
The locals here believe if you can see the mountain in the morning, it brings good luck. NIKI's POV: the view. Nothing but mist, dark skies and ra

Inside the race track: puddles everywhere. The rain conti to fall. The circuit is covered in water... DRIVERS and the TEAMS arrive at the race track. JAMES and TEDDY MAYER and ALASTAIR CALDWELL among them... SPECTATORS are huddled under umbrellas. TV CREWS struggle keep expensive equipment dry... An American VOICE comes over the tannoy...
All drivers to the control tower, please. Immediately. JAMES looks at CALDWELL...

A driver's meeting has been called. All the DRIVERS are i small room, arguing and remonstrating with FIA OFFICIALS blazer-wearing POWERS THAT BE... A Japanese official, (AKIYAMA), is trying to keep the pea AKIYAMA
One at a time! Gentlemen, please! Local JAPANESE DRIVERS are complaining in Japanese, (we s sub-titles)... TAKAHARA
You can't send us out in that! It's a death sentence! HASEMI
You have to postpone the race!
JAMES, MAYER and CALDWELL arrive in a corridor outside th meeting room... MAYER

Niki's talking to them about cancelling the race. JAMES's POV: he can see NIKI, his wounds horribly visible remonstrating with the JAPANESE OFFICIAL about the danger track conditions... JAMES turns to TEDDY and ALASTAIR... JAMES
I don't want any part of this. I'm not going to be responsible for turning the room again. CALDWELL
But you have no option. You HAVE to race, James. It's your only shot. If you don't, Niki wins.. JAMES

I'm not voting against Niki again....or forcing fellow drivers to risk their lives. Sorry. World Championship or not... JAMES raises his hands and walks off. CALDWELL shouts aft him, "James, wait..!" Then MAYER reassures CALDWELL...

Don't worry, this race is going ahead. The TV rights have been sold all around the world. MAYER can see that a vote is taking place in the room. Ma the drivers have their hands in the air, voting... The JAPANESE OFFICIAL is struggling to keep order in the

The drivers can vote all they like. A round of applause in the room, as the DRIVERS vote to c the race. But unseen by the DRIVERS.. The FIA OFFICIALS, TV NETWORK EXECUTIVES, and the blazere POWERS THAT BE are in dark, conspiratorial discussion.. ...making the decision that the race goes ahead.

NEWSCASTERS from all over the world, in several different languages, announce that a decision has been made.. The JAPANESE Grand Prix is definitely going ahead. The dr have been called to the starting grid...

In the pits alongside JAMES... A series of shots of the other DRIVERS...being sent out l lambs to the slaughter... Visibly terrified, mouthing prayers, smoking last cigaret meditating, crossing themselves, hands shaking.. Among them the JAPANESE DRIVERS. All laughter gone now. Realizing what they've got into. Risking their lives. Finally we come to rest on NIKI. Strangely calm. NIKI puts on his balaclava over his still-raw wounds, win with pain as he puts on his helmet..
JAMES is piggy-backed to his car by MECHANICS so his feet don't get soaked in the water pooling deep on the track.
JAMES lowers himself into a car with puddles on the seat. straps himself in. ALISTAIR CALDWELL approaches with a power-drill. Leans to JAMES, with the screaming drill... CALDWELL
Keep still... JAMES
What are you doing??? `ZZZZ", "ZZZZ", "ZZZZ", CALDWELL drill holes in JAMES's v CALDWELL
To let the condensation out. JAMES
But it will also let the water in. CALDWELL
Not if you're leading. CALDWELL stares at JAMES... CALDWELL
Trust me. This race is all about the start. Whoever's in front will see everything. Whoever's second... CALDWELL gestures, "Nothing"..
Good luck. They shake hands. JAMES starts the engine with a roar.

NIKI's engine replies with a loud roar. He looks over at JAMES. JAMES turns to face NIKI.. ALL SOUND GOES SILENT... ...as JAMES and NIKI stare at one another. All around the the world slows down. Comes to a standstill.

A connection between them. Unspoken realization of where have both got to. What this moment means. For them both.. It's what they have been waiting for. Working towards. Al this time. NIKI raises his hand. In a gesture only JAMES sees. JAMES raises his in return. A private salute. Chivalric. From a bygone era. And in that moment, enemies become brothers. Two men. Risking their lives. THE TEN SECOND FLAG IS RAISED.. The moment's truce is broken. They return to the task at THE FLAG DROPS. THEY'RE OFF.
HUNT's foot hits the floor. NIKI's foot hits the floor... JAMES gets the better start. His car aquaplanes like craz skating over the water, totally out of control...
CALDWELL and MAYER watch from the pit wall...
Hold onto it, James..!
Miraculously JAMES steadies the car... The spray from his wheels creates a curtain of mist. The cars are wrapped inside it... But JAMES has a clear view ahead. He slams his foot down.
It's the perfect start for Hunt!
NIKI can see nothing. Surrounded by spray, water, noise.
Other cars are spinning all around him. It's chaos. NIKI bravely accelerates into blindness...
But Lauda's car is right on his tail! Barely visible in the spray..!
JAMES goes to a corner, then his car twitches, aquaplanes again...badly...almost losing it completely...
Hunt turns too tightly! He almost lost his car right there...!
BUBBLES HORSLEY, ALEXANDER HESKETH and a number of the characters from the Hesketh Racing days are all watching.
Concentrate, Superstar!
JAMES struggles to hold onto his car. He steadies it, maintaining the lead.

JAMES's spray makes it impossible for NIKI to see. NIKI c blink his eyes...it's agony. Half-blind, NIKI tries to overtake. Gives it everything h got, breaking as late as he can, tearing through the gear For NIKI the world flies past in a near-blind blur. The steering wheel shakes. The car cannot be driven any harde But the visibility is terrible. The spray tears into his scarred eyes. He is unable to see anything but... MARLENE's beautiful face: staring at him. Smiling tenderl Kissing him tenderly.
JAMES continues to race flat out. Engine screaming. Foot the floor. His car aquaplanes again...almost skidding out
SUZY HUNT is watching on television as RICHARD BURTON tal the background on the telephone... SUZY (urging him on)
Come on, James...
A sign is held up as JAMES races. Lap 39. But there are problems with the car. One of the tyres... CALDWELL
God! His front tyre! Look! It's completely frayed! CALDWELL and TEDDY MAYER watch in horror from the pits an TV. They can see the shaking car.. COMMENTATOR
Hunt's car has problems...it's shaking...the Englishman is definitely getting slower...
ALASTAIR CALDWELL holds up a sign.... CHANGE TYRE COMMENTATOR
...with just a few laps to go, McLaren are calling for Hunt to come into the pits to change tyres... JAMES's car roars past the pits, refusing to stop... COMMENTATOR
But Hunt is refusing! Simply ignoring his team's orders...! He's made the calculation that he can still hold onto the lead...!
HESKETH and BUBBLES cover their eyes. Can't look... BUBBLES
James!! What are you doing??? HESKETH
I can't bear it!
Suddenly, a Ferrari in JAMES's wing mirror. Unmistakably, in the spray, he can see the distinctive RED HELMET... It's NIKI. JAMES's blood runs cold... JAMES

No! No! NO!!!! JAMES tries to fend NIKI off. Swerves this way and that. his wounded car is now running at seventy per cent at bes ...and disaster!!! NIKI OVERTAKES HIM... JAMES screams in agony and frustration. He's lost it! And no one to blame but himself! His own arrogance. And stubbornness. NIKI's overtaken him! THE CHEQUERED FLAG. JAMES roars past. Has finished in third place. But that i consolation. NIKI has beaten him. As far as he's concerne JAMES has lost. Lost everything.
JAMES's car arrives in the pits. In a fury. At himself. F refusing to listen. What a disgrace. What shame. What a f But he is engulfed. JAMES gets out of his car, raging...
I'm sorry! But TEDDY MAYER is celebrating wildly. ALASTAIR CALDWELL, The world's media descends on JAMES... MAYER
Sorry?? What are you talking about?? You did it!
What?
You WON!!
Rubbish!! What about Niki?? He overtook me!! I saw it!! A Ferrari with a red helmet..
That wasn't Niki. That was Regazzoni.
What???
Niki withdrew. Said it was too dangerous, refused to drive!! (gestures)
You're Champion of the World, kiddo! TEDDY MAYER takes JAMES's number `11' from the side of hi car, and tears it in two, leaving number `1'. JAMES's face: as he realizes. Then explodes with happines
HESKETH and BUBBLES cheer in celebration...
He did it! He bloody well did it!
A television plays in the Emergency Ward of the hospital. NURSIE catches sight of the victory, patients cheering an applauding... NURSIE allows herself a smile.
BURTON is at the door in tuxedo, waiting to go. SUZY, dre glamorously, smiles.
Well done, James.. Then turns the TV off. And follows BURTON out.
JAMES is embraced by CALDWELL and MAYER.

Across the race-track, the sound of helicopter blades tur JAMES looks over to see... NIKI in the helicopter with MARLENE and a PILOT. NIKI, no ex-World Champion, looks over to see a triumphant JAMES surrounded by press, McLaren colleagues, etc MARLENE
Are you OK? NIKI turns, takes MARLENE's hand as he answers. NIKI
Fine. It's just one race. The helicopter lifts into the air, and flies off...

JAMES watches as the helicopter carrying NIKI flies away, turns to see... ...the world's press begins to descend on him, and the bi party of JAMES HUNT's life is about to begin.. In the background, the two JAPANESE DRIVERS are giving interviews again. They didn't just survive, MASAHIRO HASE got the fastest lap of the race, and NORITAKE TAKAHARA ca 9th... And at that moment, magically, the sun breaks through, an snowy peak of Mount Fuji is finally revealed.

Of newspaper headlines, television talk shows, lucrative endorsements, TV commercials, sponsorship, public billboa JAMES's world championship victory has made him a rich ma His movie star looks make him an international STAR and marketing man's dream. Girls, more girls, and even more girls.
JAMES, dashing in a white suit, plays trumpet on the UK's famous talk show...
We're on the runway of an airport in Northern Italy.

A stretch limousine pulls up on the tarmac. A still-drunk JAMES HUNT and several good-looking WOMEN, FRIENDS (and hangers-on) spill out of the limo... They cross the tarmac towards their waiting private jet, passing other jets, when JAMES stops. He's seen something that has caught his eye. JAMES sends his FRIENDS on ahead to their waiting jet, an walks over to a small private jet, (a Learjet 35)...
I heard you were spending more and more time in one of these... A hunched PILOT doing final checks. The figure turns. It' NIKI. His wounds have healed a little, but it's still a painful sight...
Do you fly?
No.
You should try it. If something goes wrong up there, you're on the edge, but have to stay within the rules. Stick to regulations. Suppress the ego. It's good discipline for the racing.
And there I was thinking you were about to wax lyrical about the romance of flight. I should have known better.
What brings you here?
JAMES indicates his rowdy, cool-looking friends..
A friend's wedding. At least I think it was a wedding. Might have been a birthday. All a bit of a blur. How about you? Been at Fiorano?
Pre-season testing.
Already? In February? You're relentless.
Thank you.
I'm not sure I meant it as a compliment.

But it is one. Relentlessness is good. Means you're a fighter. That you never give up. Behind my back I know some of you guys call me `The Rat.' Because I look like one. It's meant as an insult. But I don't mind it. Rats are ugly, sure. And no one likes them. But they're intelligent. With a strong survival instinct. JAMES can't help smiling. That's NIKI.
So when do you start testing? Next week?
Are you mad? I didn't just win the biggest thing of my life so I could get right back to work.
Why? You need to. To prove to all the people who will always say you only won it because...
Because what...? Because of your accident? Is that other people, Niki? Or you? I won. On the all important day when it came down to it, we raced on equal terms in equally good cars.
JAMES (contid)
You bottled and I had the guts to see it through. NIKI
It's true. You won that race. And believe me if I had to lose that title to anyone, I'm happy it was you. But that doesn't change the fact you have to win again. JAMES
Why? NIKI
Because that's what it means to be a winner, no? It's a permanent condition. Never stops or goes away. It stays with you always. JAMES

That's winning? Sounds like losing to me. Some of life needs to be for pleasure, Niki. What's the use of having a million cups and medals if you never have any fun? How is that winning? The plane load of JAMES's friends call out..."C'mon, Jame NIKI

You're right. I could learn from you. In hospital the toughest part of my treatment was the vacuum. Pumping the shit out of my lungs. It was agony. While doing it, I was watching television...you winning all those races...and I was cursing you.. "That bastard, Hunt", I would shout, "I hate that guy." one day the doctor said, "Mr. Lauda, may I offer one piece of advice? Stop thinking of it as a curse to have been given an enemy in life. It can be a blessing, too." I said, "Who are you, Confucius?" He said, "A wise man gets more from his enemies than a fool from his friends." And you know, he's right. Look at us. We were a pair of kids when we first met. Hotheaded jerks in Formula 3. Headed nowhere. Now we're both Champions of the world. Not bad. JAMES
No, not bad.
NIKI
So don't let me down now. I need you busting my balls. Get back to work. JAMES
I will, Niki. But I intend to enjoy myself first. And so should you. You think you can? NIKI stares. A blank look.. JAMES
See you on race day, Champ. NIKI
You will. Champ. JAMES goes. NIKI watches him, pulled into his plane by hi laughing, cool FRIENDS. An unmistakable flicker of envy i eyes. Then NIKI turns, alone, and resumes his safety checks.
JAMES's plane roars down the runway and takes off into th azure blue sky...

head_text.subj: CHALLENGER AGAIN. HE RETIRED IN 1979. AFTER SHORT CAREERS
BROADCASTING AND BUDGIE BREEDING HE DIED OF A HEART ATTAC
AND AGAIN IN 1984. HE NOW RUNS A SUCCESSFUL COMMERCIAL
AIRLINE. HE STILL CLAIMS TO HAVE NO FRIENDS."

text: The End
